headline: Why Tesla is doubling down on energy storage
summary: Tesla (TSLA) unveiled the new Megapack 3 battery pack and a Megablock large-scale energy storage unit. Yahoo Finance Senior Autos Reporter Pras Subramanian outlines the details and explains why the electric vehicle (EV) giant is expanding its energy storage business. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.
